name: Bobby the Ball
description:
The Player must lead Bobby to the end of progressively challenging stages. Jump, slam and bounce your way to help Bobby through the levels!

Bobby the Ball is only playable on Windows and requires Mouse and Keyboard to play.

Bobby the Ball was created for the Games Proposal module of my univsersity course of Games Design at the University of Central Lancashire.
UCLan Games Design: https://gamescourse.co.uk/
